org.trimou.lambda.i18n

Class ResourceBundleLambda

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trimou.lambda.InputProcessingLambda
      • org.trimou.lambda.i18n.ResourceBundleLambda
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MustacheEngineBuilder.EngineBuiltCallback, Lambda

    public class ResourceBundleLambda
extends InputProcessingLambda
implements MustacheEngineBuilder.EngineBuiltCallback
    Displays localized messages. It might be registered as a global lambda - see MustacheEngineBuilder.addGlobalData(String, Object). 
     {{#bundle}}key{{/bundle}}
    Author:
    Martin Kouba
    See Also:
    ResourceBundle, ResourceBundleHelper, ResourceBundleResolver
